articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: Macron stands by remarks about sending troops to Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: French president has faced a barrage of criticism, but said his comments were “weighed, thought through and measured.”
articles.content:
On Monday, Macron said after a leaders' conference on support for Kyiv that there was "no consensus" on sending ground troops to Ukraine in an "official manner," but that "nothing was excluded."
The… [+540 chars]
